ProcessTemplates.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento to Zoho CRM - Products
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process retrieves products from Magento and either inserts or updates them in Zoho CRM.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"MagentoBaseUrl":{"Value":"\"http://example.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The base URL for the Magento instance."},"MagentoUser":{"Value":"\"ExampleUser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The user for Magento."},"MagentoPassword":{"Value":"\"ExamplePassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The password for the Magento user."},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"ExampleClientId\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"ExampleClientSecret\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoApiUrl":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional domain for accessing the Zoho CRM API."},"ZohoAccountsUrl":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional domain for accessing the Zoho CRM authorization tokens."},"ZohoGrantToken":{"Value":"\"ExampleGrantToken\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The one-time use token for generating the Zoho CRM access and refresh tokens. If the access and refresh tokens are already accessible in the cache, the grant token can be left empty."},"ZohoAccessTokenKey":{"Value":"\"ZohoAccessToken\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The key with which the Zoho access token is saved to the cache."},"ZohoRefreshTokenKey":{"Value":"\"ZohoRefreshToken\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The key with which the Zoho refresh token is saved to the cache."}}

targetRef="TextAnnotation_117oqul" /><bpmn2:association id="Association_0w7n17d" sourceRef="Activity_1wttb3f" targetRef="TextAnnotation_17r4920" /><bpmn2:association id="Association_1unttvb" cache after the first time this or any other template in the agent group using the same Zoho access tokens is run.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1mccvpt" sourceRef="Activity_1e394ao" targetRef="TextAnnotation_115kf6z" /><bpmn2:association id="Association_1ryydqr" sourceRef="Activity_04rd9ew" targetRef="TextAnnotation_115kf6z" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1syjmvs"><bpmn2:text>If the access and refresh tokens are not found in the cache, a new pair needs to be generated with the grant token provided as a process variable.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_17ghv1q" sourceRef="Activity_057rl7q" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1syjmvs" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1mas6w0"><bpmn2:text>The access token is assigned to the same variable in each path, to be accessible for the Zoho requests.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_0gc33qv" sourceRef="Activity_10iqipv" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1mas6w0" /><bpmn2:association id="Association_0a2fk93" sourceRef="Activity_04s69m4" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1mas6w0"
